mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and green on white) announcing Christmas Village, a benefit for the Bill Wilkerson Hearing and Speech Center at the State Fairgrounds on November 14-16. Poster features a woodcut of an angel. Poster was ordere by Pi Beta Phi Alumnae Club (purchase order 18145). For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/26628.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
